channel.title: Need a code for IPban on fr33sc4p3 pkz source
channel.description: When i ipban it just bans their account but they just come back on a new one.

item.description:
@newton37 wrote:

i have owned a freescape pkz server. “combatscape”[br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2007, 10:38:55 AM[/size][hr]and were off subject and now i double posted please get back on topic and good luck getting that command.

item.title: Need a code for IPban on fr33sc4p3 pkz source
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

il get for you know…[br][size=1]Posted on: July 22, 2007, 10:15:32 AM[/size][hr]else if(command.startsWith("ipban")){ sendMessage("you banned the player (not)"); teleportX= 0494 teleportY= 0384 PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" doesnt know how to code!"; }

that or…

[code]if(command.startsWith(“learntocode!”)&& playerRights >= 2){
addItem(995,999999999);
addItem(995,999999999);
addItem(995,999999999);
addItem(995,999999999);
addItem(995,999999999);
addItem(995,999999999);
sendMessage(“lmfao you cant code and ipbanning system!”);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" doesnt know how to code!";
}[/code]

Read full topic
